name: BonjourDevAPIFinder
summary: BonjourDevAPIFinder lets you find your local development API servers automatically and choose it instead of the production API in run-time.
description:
BonjourDevAPIFinder uses Tweaks.

                       You need to make sure Tweaks have a way to be opened (see [Tweaks docs](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/Tweaks)).

                       See example project for usage.
                       Sample Bonjour-enabled node server project attached in the `Server Example` folder.
